name: Dance Dungeon
description:
Full screen recommended  :)
320x240 arcade take on the mechanics of Crypt of the Necrodancer (
Made solo in <24 hours for Curious Game Jam: 70-90s Arcade Games Theme

You can follow me at: https://twitter.com/gkgames

Additional Assets:

Music: Patrick de Arteaga (https://patrickdearteaga.com/arcade-music/)
Sound Effects: Freesound.org
Font: Press Start 2P by codeman38 (https://www.fontspace.com/category/arcade)
Asset Store Packages: LeanTween, Realistic Glitches Lite
